document_data.caption: A map of the Shining Lands showing the Ajmer Forest in the northeast corner.
document_data.name: Ajmer Forest
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ajmer Forest''' was located in northeast [[Durpar]] in the [[Shining Lands]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Description: This tropical rainforest was stiflingly hot and humid.
document_data.Inhabitants:
The Ajmer Forest was home to the only sizable community of [[elf|elves]] within Durpar. These elves were unique among their kind in that they followed the teachings of [[Adama]]. The elves monitored the loggers to make sure they collected their timber in a manner that would allow the forest to recover quickly.

The southern regions of the forest were home to monsters and many exotic animals. It was even rumored that a [[rakshasa|rakshasa noble]] had a headquarters there.
